name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Sarah is a passionate fitness professional with over 10 years of experience helping clients achieve their wellness goals. She believes in creating sustainable, enjoyable fitness routines that fit into busy lifestyles.

name: Mike Chen
bio: Mike combines his background in competitive athletics with evidence-based training methods. He specializes in high-intensity workouts and helping athletes reach peak performance.

name: Emily Rodriguez
bio: Emily focuses on the mind-body connection through yoga and pilates. She helps clients find balance, reduce stress, and build both physical and mental strength.

name: David Kim
bio: David specializes in functional movement and strength training. His approach focuses on building strength that translates to everyday activities and preventing injuries.

name: Lisa Thompson
bio: Lisa brings energy and fun to every workout. She believes fitness should be enjoyable and helps clients find joy in movement through dance and functional training.

name: Carlos Martinez
bio: Carlos is a former competitive weightlifter who now helps others discover their strength potential. He focuses on proper technique and progressive overload to achieve results safely.

name: Amanda Foster
bio: Amanda specializes in working with special populations, including pregnant women and seniors. She creates safe, effective programs that accommodate individual needs and limitations.

name: Ryan Parker
bio: Ryan focuses on movement quality and functional strength. He helps clients move better, feel better, and perform better in their daily activities through corrective exercise and mobility work.
